title: New: 4am – Yearning & Calling
content:
London duo 4am are keeping their cards close to their chests with regards to information.

With two immaculately produced tracks to their name, the debut, More. and recent offering, Yearning & Calling, in stereotypical blog fashion, that’s about as much as they’re giving away. Some sultry vocals, vaguely ominous sounding synths and James Blake-esque beats dominate Yearning & Calling, making for an intoxicating listen. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
